text: "Reggae Night" is a 1983 song by Jamaican singer Jimmy Cliff and it was taken from his album The Power and the Glory. It was released on Columbia Records in the United States, Canada and Mexico. It went to number 1 in New Zealand, number 2 in South Africa and France, number 35 in Germany, number 40 in Canada, number 5 in Belgium, number 6 in the Netherlands and number 8 in Italy. ==Track listing== #"Reggae Night" (3:58) #"Reggae Night (instrumental)" (3:58) ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Jimmy Cliff songs
title: Reggae Night
